format_version.description: Version of the blueprint format, used for compatibility checks

update_url.description: URL to check for updates, can be null if not imported from a URL

version.description: Version of the blueprint, used for compatibility checks

docker_images.description: List of Docker images that can be used with this blueprint

file.description: Path to the file that is blocked

viewable.description: If true, the user can see that the file exists, but still cannot see its contents or modify it

accessible.description: If true, the user can see the file contents, but cannot modify it

blocked_files.description: List of files that the user is not allowed to access or modify

start_command.description: Command to start the server, can use environment variables like {{$env::SERVER_BINARY}} or {{$env::SERVER_MEMORY}}

stop_command.description: Command to stop the server, can use stop codes like {{$code::sigint}} for graceful shutdown

setup_script_base64.description: Base64 encoded setup script that will be executed during server setup

setup_docker_image.description: Docker image used for server setup, can be different from the runtime images

setup_interpreter.description: Interpreter used for the setup script (e.g., bash, sh, python)
